Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Establishes the office of the caregiving economy
Summary: Establishes the "office of the caregiving economy", for the purpose of promoting and supporting the state's caregiving needs by developing the caregiving economy in the state.
LawCode: Add Art 4-D §§147 - 147-c, amd §100, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to establishing the office of the caregiving economy
